actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that certain handicapped individuals shall be eligible for medical assistance.

summary.text: Amends Title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to extend medical assistance under such Title to individuals who are unable to care for their personal needs due to a physical or mental handicap which may result in death or which has lasted or may last continuously for at least one year.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that certain handicapped individuals shall be eligible for medical assistance.
